name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in **Java**, **Spring**, and **PostgreSQL**. Proficient in modern development tools such as **Kafka**, **Git**, **GitHub Actions**, **Jenkins**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**, ensuring efficient CI/CD processes and seamless deployment. Expert in building robust microservices architecture and managing containerized applications, focusing on security, scalability, and compliance with industry standards. Strong background in developing enterprise-level applications that incorporate AI/ML capabilities for enhanced decision-making processes.
Brings comprehensive experience in healthcare and finance sectors, where strong analytical skills and a passion for impactful software development are leveraged. Accomplished in leading teams and driving projects to completion, while maintaining high-quality code standards.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed reliable, scalable backend services using **Java** and **Spring**, ensuring robustness and performance for critical applications in healthcare and finance.
• Designed and implemented data storage solutions using **PostgreSQL** optimized for high-volume transactions, ensuring data integrity and compliance with regulations like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
• Integrated messaging systems such as **Kafka** to facilitate real-time data processing and enhance system communication for timely alerts and notifications.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins** to automate build, test, and deployment processes, ensuring consistent quality in code delivery.
• Leveraged **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration of microservices, enabling seamless scaling and management of application components in production.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to refactor monolithic applications into microservices architecture, improving system resilience and fault tolerance in healthcare applications.
• Enhanced system monitoring and logging frameworks to achieve **99.99%** uptime, implementing alerts and backup strategies for critical services.
• Developed enterprise-level solutions by managing distributed databases with **PostgreSQL** and **Kafka**, optimizing for large-scale data ingestion and analytics to support financial modeling.
• Spearheaded the use of design patterns within **Java** and **Spring** to improve code maintainability and reduce technical debt, enabling a reduction in bug resolution time by **30%**.
• Conducted code reviews and contributed to the team knowledge base to foster continuous learning and improvement in agile development practices.

Leveraged **Java** and **Spring** frameworks to enhance financial application performance, achieving a **30%** reduction in response time for high-volume transaction processing systems.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs integrated with **PostgreSQL** for secure data storage and retrieval, enabling efficient management of over **1 million** transactions per month.
Utilized **Kafka** for managing real-time data streams, improving operational efficiency by ensuring seamless communication across various microservices.
Exclusively adopted **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to manage containerized applications, resulting in improved scalability and a **40%** increase in deployment efficiency across multiple environments.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Git**, **GitHub Actions**, and **Jenkins**, automating testing and deployment processes and reducing time-to-market by **25%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop high-quality software solutions leveraging Agile methodologies, promoting a collaborative environment and continuous improvement.
Provided mentorship and technical guidance to junior developers, facilitating growth and skill enhancement within the engineering team while maintaining code quality standards.

Developed and optimized robust backend services utilizing **Java** and **Spring** for scalable e-commerce applications, ensuring system reliability and performance.
Engineered data-driven solutions with **PostgreSQL** to support high-traffic operation scenarios, maintaining database integrity and quick data retrieval under peak load conditions.
Implemented event-driven architectures using **Kafka** for efficient message processing, dramatically enhancing system responsiveness with **9x** faster order processing times.
Managed CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins** to automate testing and deployments, cutting down deployment times by **30%**.
Containerized applications with **Docker** and orchestrated using **Kubernetes**, achieving seamless scaling capabilities and service resilience across multi-cloud environments.
Utilized version control with **Git** to maintain code integrity, enabling collaborative development and efficient tracking of changes across **9+** team members.
Executed application performance tuning and debugging, leading to a reduction in server response time by **25%**.
Applied **Akka** framework principles to enhance concurrent processing capabilities, improving system throughput during peak usage.
Participated in Agile development cycles, contributing to daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives, ensuring effective team collaboration and project alignment.
